text.div:
Generated Narrative: Condition

Resource Condition "BSJ-HemiparesisDiagnosis"

Profile: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/pacio-pfe/StructureDefinition/pfe-condition-encounter-diagnosis

Condition Asserted Date: 2024-04-18 13:30:00-0400

clinicalStatus: Active (Condition Clinical Status Codes#active)

verificationStatus: Confirmed (ConditionVerificationStatus#confirmed)

category: Power of muscles on one side of the body (International Classification of Functioning, Disability and Health#b7302), Encounter Diagnosis (US Core Condition Category Extension Codes#encounter-diagnosis)

code: Right hemiparesis (disorder) (SNOMED CT#278286009)

bodySite: Entire Right Arm (body structure) (SNOMED CT#368209003)

subject: Patient/Example-Smith-Johnson-Patient1 " SMITH-JOHNSON"

onset: 2024-04-17 15:40:00-0400

recordedDate: 2024-04-18 13:30:00-0400

asserter: PractitionerRole/Role-Neuro-NuraMekel

note: Patient began experiencing right sided weakness, primarily in arm and shoulder. There was no facial droop, but patient reports "tingling" in R face / numbness along R brow. Symptoms in face resolved post tPA administration. Strength improved in shoulder, weakness did not fully resolve. Demonstrates R arm weakness and lack of coordination. Fine motor skills significantly degraded and have not improved post tPA.

coding.display: Power of muscles on one side of the body
